casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Guy Tobias LEGRANDE No. 327P02-11 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 7, 2019 Guy Tobias LeGrande, for LeGrande, Guy Tobias. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, T. Lynn Clodfelter, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 4th of February 2019 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Stanly County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of February 2019."

Ervin, J. recused
